game.name: JANKLADY
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play on TV, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 당신은 한때 성의 아가씨였고, 평화롭게 살아가고 있었어야 했다.눈을 떴을 때, 남아 있는 것은 황량한 폐허뿐이었습니다.당신은 지하 피난처에서 기어나와 약속된 장소를 향해 나아가야 합니다.**"JANKLADY"**는 RPG입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: You were once a noble lady of a castle, living peacefully—or so it should have been.When you awoke, all that remained was a desolate wasteland.You must crawl out from your underground shelter and head toward the promised place."JANKLADY" is an RPG.

reviewHighlights.text: I've played the game for nearly an hour and a half with idea how to progress after collecting items randomly and exploring becomes tiring just getting...
that was freaking awesome,, i love collecting things for the weird characters and i really like finding cats out and about,
